mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SERVICE WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN SER_STD AND SER_END

SELECT SER_CODE , A.COM_CODE , COM_CNM , SER_EMP , SER_PERI , SERVICE_PAY , SER_STD , SER_END , SER_NAME FROM SERVICE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY B ON A.COM_CODE = B.COM_CODE WHERE A.COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN SER_STD AND SER_END
